title: The Mansion on Ocean Boulevard
description: In this Dateline classic, when two tragic deaths occur within one week of each other in a wealthy area in California, families begin to wonder what happened inside a beachfront mansion. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Updated on January 24, 2021.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
